articles.author: Brady Dale
articles.title: The promise and perils of staking cryptocurrency
articles.description: A massive amount of value is tied up in staking. On the Ethereum blockchain alone, $30 billion in value is staked on the network, guaranteeing its transactions are provably fair.
articles.content:
Crypto staking is a way of maintaining consensus over bookkeeping systems with thousands of simultaneously updated copies that is, a blockchain.

articles.author: Wired
articles.title: In Ukraine, Crypto Finds a Purpose
articles.description: The UN’s refugee agency has partnered with blockchain and money transfer companies to get vital aid to people displaced by conflict.
articles.content: Crypto has been tapped to collect donations during humanitarian crises in the past. It has been successful in bringing together pools of money, but it can be difficult to actually use on the ground. … [+3681 chars]
